channel.title: [REL] Project-75
channel.description:
PLEASE NOTE: This source is not 100% original, The base (Obviously) Is Hybrid PVP v3, and the original source I used was "Downscape Dungeoneering" which was released on here about a year ago, Link: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,498188.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,498188.0.html[/url] I added several features and fixed many bugs. As well as added some necessary things for a good source now days, In other meaning, I updated it.
[img]http://project75.freeforums.org/download/file.php?logo=___logo.png[/img]
[size=24pt][u][b]DOWNLOADS[/b][/u][/size] Source: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?vtkxjz7sz96868r]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?vtkxjz7sz96868r[/url] Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?932c880fo25u5bs]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?932c880fo25u5bs[/url]
[COLOR=red][B][U][size=24pt]Features[/size][/U] [/B][/COLOR] All skills working 97% Summoning 75% Dungeoneering (Token system) Working spirit shields (Kill corporeal beast for spirit shield, bless with holy elixir) Working hunter, and agility
[size=24pt][u][b]WHAT HAS BEEN ADDED[/b][/u][/size] I added a control panel to the source Added Dicing Added Working Dungeoneering cape(With Emote)+Hood Added a system where It says "USERNAME" Has achieved level 99 in "SKILL NAME" Several commands including an updated ::players(Shows a list of who is on), ::commands, ::kill, and ::hail Staffzone shop editor A few items to shops that should have been there from the start And more I can't think of off of the top of my head, I will edit it later with other things.
[COLOR=red][B][U][size=24pt]Some screenshots[/size][/U][/B][/COLOR] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/97996038/corp.png[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/97996038/Summoning.png[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/97996038/Skilling%20area.png[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/97996038/Dungeoneering1.png[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/97996038/Dunegoneering2.png[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/97996038/Dungeoneering3.png[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/97996038/Dungeoneering4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i763.photobucket.com/albums/xx273/v1nch3nz0/Untitled6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i763.photobucket.com/albums/xx273/v1nch3nz0/Untitled5.png[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ik142eBAfHo
And again, This source is NOT Originally mine, And I do give credits to Kevin(Creator of hybrid pvp) and Justhin(Creator of downscape) for a lot of this work.
on a side note, Most of you won't care, I played both the original hybrid pvp, which was named runeclassicon(I was a co on it), and Downscape(I was a donator on it). Also note, The client says it's by "Sek" and My name in game is "Defiant" That is only because I have changed my name in the game itself.
EDIT: I have recently noticed that there is an error in PlayerAssistant.java, so, Search [code]public void levelUp(int skill)[/code] then [code]case 22:[/code] Then look for [code]c.dialogueAction = 0; c.nextChat = 0;[/code] - There should be one bracket on the line after that, click after said bracket and hit enter, then add another bracket, which should be on line 2642.

item.title: [REL] Project-75
item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

Client>hybridpvpnetcache>Sprites>Player - Crows are in there, recommended size is 15x15, They Must remain with the name they have if you want them to work, White = Transparent

Read full topic

item.title: [REL] Project-75
item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

That’s a picture of a client I made and scraped. The one you download does not look like that. I took these pictures awhile before I released this because I was planning on doing it sooner, Just some stuff got in the way that made it not possible to do. So that client isn’t available for download.

Read full topic

item.title: [REL] Project-75
item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

PLEASE NOTE: This source is not 100% original, The base (Obviously) Is Hybrid PVP v3, and the original source I used was “Downscape Dungeoneering” which was released on here about a year ago, Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,498188.0.html
I added several features and fixed many bugs. As well as added some necessary things for a good source now days, In other meaning, I updated it.

[size=24pt]DOWNLOADS[/size]
Source: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?vtkxjz7sz96868r
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?932c880fo25u5bs

[COLOR=red][size=24pt]Features[/size] [/COLOR]
All skills working
97% Summoning
75% Dungeoneering (Token system)
Working spirit shields (Kill corporeal beast for spirit shield, bless with holy elixir)
Working hunter, and agility

[size=24pt]WHAT HAS BEEN ADDED[/size]
I added a control panel to the source
Added Dicing
Added Working Dungeoneering cape(With Emote)+Hood
Added a system where It says “USERNAME” Has achieved level 99 in “SKILL NAME”
Several commands including an updated ::players(Shows a list of who is on), ::commands, ::kill, and ::hail
Staffzone
shop editor
A few items to shops that should have been there from the start
And more I can’t think of off of the top of my head, I will edit it later with other things.

[COLOR=red][size=24pt]Some screenshots[/size][/COLOR]

And again, This source is NOT Originally mine, And I do give credits to Kevin(Creator of hybrid pvp) and Justhin(Creator of downscape) for a lot of this work.

on a side note, Most of you won’t care, I played both the original hybrid pvp, which was named runeclassicon(I was a co on it), and Downscape(I was a donator on it).
Also note, The client says it’s by “Sek” and My name in game is “Defiant” That is only because I have changed my name in the game itself.

EDIT: I have recently noticed that there is an error in PlayerAssistant.java, so, Search public void levelUp(int skill) then case 22: Then look for c.dialogueAction = 0; c.nextChat = 0; - There should be one bracket on the line after that, click after said bracket and hit enter, then add another bracket, which should be on line 2642.

Read full topic
